solution_line_template: An adult panda will eat {adult_panda_daily_eat} pounds of bamboo * {days_in_week} days = <<{adult_panda_daily_eat}*{days_in_week}={adult_panda_weekly_eat}>>{adult_panda_weekly_eat} pounds.
A baby panda will eat {baby_panda_daily_eat} pounds * {days_in_week} days = <<{baby_panda_daily_eat}*{days_in_week}={baby_panda_weekly_eat}>>{baby_panda_weekly_eat} pounds.
Total the pandas will eat {adult_panda_weekly_eat} pounds + {baby_panda_weekly_eat} = <<{adult_panda_weekly_eat}+{baby_panda_weekly_eat}={total_weekly_eat}>>{total_weekly_eat} pounds of bamboo.
